question: Fajr Sunnah after Fajr Fard Salaat???
answer:
QUESTION
Dear Mufti Saheb: Asalaamualikum Wr Wb Fajr Salaat: Sometimes I happen to reach the masjid at a time when the Fajr jamaat has already started praying. So, I join them in FARD prayer. Now that I have prayed FARD and not yet prayed 2 rakat SUNNAH. Can I pray the 2 rakat sunnah after the FARD is complete (before sunrise ofcourse), or should I wait till after sunrise to perform the 2 rakat SUNNAH?
ANSWER


Share:
A person should read the Sunnats of Fajr Salaat out of the Musjid proper,
even though the Imaam has commenced his Salaat as long as he knows that he
would be able to join the Salaat with Jamaat at least at the point of
Tashahhud, i.e. last sitting. (Shaami vol.2 pg.454; Maktaba Imdaadiyyah)

If the Sunnats had been missed out together with the Fardh of Fajr Salaat,
then Qadhaa of both, the Sunnats and Fardh Salaats should be made before the
time of Zawaal, and if Qadhaa of Fajr Salaat is done after Zawaal, then only
the Fardh should be performed, not the Sunnats. However, if only the Sunnats
were missed, it should not be repeated after the Fardh of Fajr Salaat, i.e.
before sunrise. It may be performed before Zawaal on the same day. (Ibid
pg.512)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
